item.title: Master Spring Data AOT in IntelliJ IDEA
item.description: Spring‚Äôs AOT engine has been around since the Spring Native days, but Spring Data never really benefited from it ‚Äì until now. item.title: Building AI Agents in Kotlin ‚Äì Part 2: A Deeper Dive Into Tools

item.title: Open-source IntelliJ IDEA: A Simpler Way to Build and Contribute to the Community
item.description: IntelliJ IDEA‚Äôs source code has been publicly available for more than 15 years, helping millions of developers learn, experiment, and contribute to their IDE and build their own tools.
